metadata.title: CVE-2020-10691 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An archive traversal flaw was found in all ansible-engine versions 2.9.xprior to 2.9.7, when running ansible-galaxy collection install. Whenextracting a collection .tar.gz file, the directory is created withoutsanitizing the filename. An attacker could take advantage to overwrite anyfile within the system.

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
